div.head: 夜臥不寧
div.div: lying down at night without finding rest

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: lying down at night without finding rest

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with ye wo bu an 夜臥不安 . Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 43: 治心氣虛弱驚悸，夜臥不 寧，沉香散方 , “To cure depletion weakness of the heart qi, with fright and palpitation, and when one lies down at night without finding rest , [use] the recipe for the powder with chen xiang ”.
